name: Leafvember!
description:
Rake leaves! Avoid shrubbery! Optimize!

It is a puzzle game. But it's not all that puzzling. Just rake the leaves. If it gets hard, well, you know, rake better. And a Happy Leafvember to all!

As you finish levels, they will be marked off of your calendar. If you meet the goal, the day will get a whole "X" instead of just a slash. Good luck raking!

Leafvember was made during #CozyAutumnGameJam2022.
